titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce for individuals the maximum rate of tax on unrecaptured section 1250 gain from 25 percent to 20 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/31/2003--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the maximum capital gains rate for certain dispositions.
